Title: Immortality?
Description:
Something is... off. The water feels strange.

When we arrived here I felt the presence of the Light, strong and vibrant, far to the north.

I thought it would be the Pools of Youth. But this... this water is tainted somehow. Stained with mogu magics.

I think it best I try only a sip and we see what happens.
ObjectivesText: Observe Vaeldrin as he tests the water of youth.
RewardText: Wha... what happened? The water... it... it only transfers life. It will not make new life.
